Text: It is a body of scanning work such as this one that makes me proud to be a comic book reader. I salute you MrclScns! This is a fine, fine upgrade of the previously available scans. (IMHO they were piss-poor.) Thank you so very much.

Wow MrclScns, this has got to be one of the best torrents I have EVER seen. Did you compose all the title pages and everything on the Alan Moore omnibus? This is truly amazing stuff. Thank you for giving me the chance to read Miracleman, would never have read it without you!
@ajsztehlo - Glad to hear it! Hope you enjoy. It's probably my all time favorite comic. And yes, i did put the Alan Moore omnibus together myself.
@MrclScns Just started reading, startling stuff! Thanks again for the upload.

The re-scanning of these are definitely better than all other Miracleman torrents out there.  Your hard work is very much appreciated!  Quality is excellent.  I can finally finish this epic series thanks MrclScns!

Awesome work MrclScns!  Valiant effort. :)
I'd like to discuss these with you.  Do you have a forum account, for PM?  (the "Forum" link at the bottom)
@RubrumPopulus - Just made one. Same user name: MrclScns
